00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Text;
00026 using System.Xml;
00027 #endregion
00028 
00029 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.RSSHelper
00030 {
00034     public class Item
00035     {
00036         #region Constructor
00037 
00041         public Item()
00042         {
00043         }
00044 
00049         public Item(XmlElement Element)
00050         {
00051             if (Element.Name.Equals("item", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00052             {
00053                 foreach (XmlNode Child in Element.ChildNodes)
00054                 {
00055                     try
00056                     {
00057                         if (Child.Name.Equals("title", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00058                         {
00059                             Title = Child.InnerText;
00060                         }
00061                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("link", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00062                         {
00063                             Link = Child.InnerText;
00064                         }
00065                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("description", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00066                         {
00067                             Description = Child.InnerText;
00068                         }
00069                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("author", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00070                         {
00071                             Author = Child.InnerText;
00072                         }
00073                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("category", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00074                         {
00075                             Categories.Add(RSS.StripIllegalCharacters(Child.InnerText));
00076                         }
00077                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("enclosure", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00078                         {
00079                             _Enclosure = new Enclosure((XmlElement)Child);
00080                         }
00081                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("pubDate", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00082                         {
00083                             PubDate = DateTime.Parse(Child.InnerText);
00084                         }
00085                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("media:thumbnail", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00086                         {
00087                             Thumbnail = new Thumbnail((XmlElement)Child);
00088                         }
00089                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("guid", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00090                         {
00091                             GUID = new GUID((XmlElement)Child);
00092                         }
00093                     }
00094                     catch { }
00095                 }
00096             }
00097         }
00098 
00099         #endregion
00100 
00101         #region Private Variables
00102         private string _Title = string.Empty;
00103         private string _Link = string.Empty;
00104         private string _Description = string.Empty;
00105         private string _Author = string.Empty;
00106         private Thumbnail _Thumbnail = null;
00107         private List<string> _Categories = null;
00108         private DateTime _pubDate = DateTime.Now;
00109         private Enclosure _Enclosure = null;
00110         #endregion
00111 
00112         #region Properties
00113 
00117         public GUID GUID { get; set; }
00118 
00122         public Thumbnail Thumbnail
00123         {
00124             get 
00125             {
00126                 if (_Thumbnail == null)
00127                 {
00128                     _Thumbnail = new Thumbnail();
00129                 }
00130                 return _Thumbnail; 
00131             }
00132             set { _Thumbnail = value; }
00133         }
00134 
00138         public string Title
00139         {
00140             get { return _Title; }
00141             set { _Title = RSS.StripIllegalCharacters(value); }
00142         }
00143 
00147         public string Link
00148         {
00149             get { return _Link; }
00150             set { _Link = value; }
00151         }
00152 
00156         public string Description
00157         {
00158             get { return _Description; }
00159             set { _Description = RSS.StripIllegalCharacters(value); }
00160         }
00161 
00165         public string Author
00166         {
00167             get { return _Author; }
00168             set { _Author = RSS.StripIllegalCharacters(value); }
00169         }
00170 
00174         public List<string> Categories
00175         {
00176             get
00177             {
00178                 if (_Categories == null)
00179                 {
00180                     _Categories = new List<string>();
00181                 }
00182                 return _Categories;
00183             }
00184             set { _Categories = value; }
00185         }
00186 
00190         public DateTime PubDate
00191         {
00192             get { return _pubDate; }
00193             set { _pubDate = value; }
00194         }
00195 
00199         public Enclosure Enclosure
00200         {
00201             get
00202             {
00203                 if (_Enclosure == null)
00204                 {
00205                     _Enclosure = new Enclosure();
00206                 }
00207                 return _Enclosure;
00208             }
00209             set { _Enclosure = value; }
00210         }
00211         #endregion

00213         #region Public Overridden Function

00215

00217 
00218         public override string ToString()
00219         {
00220             StringBuilder ItemString = new StringBuilder();
00221             ItemString.Append("<item><title>" + Title + "</title>\r\n<link>" + Link + "</link>\r\n<author>" + Author + "</author>\r\n");
00222             foreach (string Category in Categories)
00223             {
00224                 ItemString.Append("<category>" + Category + "</category>\r\n");
00225             }
00226             ItemString.Append("<pubDate>" + PubDate.ToString("r") + "</pubDate>\r\n");
00227             ItemString.Append(Enclosure.ToString());
00228             ItemString.Append(Thumbnail.ToString());
00229             ItemString.Append("<description><![CDATA[" + Description + "]]></description>\r\n");
00230             ItemString.Append(GUID.ToString());
00231             ItemString.Append("<itunes:subtitle>" + Title + "</itunes:subtitle>");
00232             ItemString.Append("<itunes:summary><![CDATA[" + Description + "]]></itunes:summary>");
00233             ItemString.Append("</item>\r\n");
00234             return ItemString.ToString();
00235         }
00236         #endregion
00237     }
